title: 12/04: Waiver Wire - Backup RBs to Add (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
Is this a good Waiver Wire week? It probably depends on the status of some injured RBs, though we do know that Matt Breida is out. So let's pick up Jeff Wilson, Jaylen Samuels (TE-eligible in some leagues) and Justin Jackson and see what happens, and don't forget about Adam Humphries and Dante Pettis ... When will the Rams sit their starters (11:15)? How many teams should make the playoffs in a 12-team league (12:30)? We've also got a sneak peak at the Waiver Wire for each position (14:55), a lookahead to Week 15 (23:05) and recaps of WAS-PHI (25:44) and LAC-PIT (28:28) ... Waiver Wire QBs (30:50) including Lamar Jackson and Josh Allen, RBs (37:12) including LeGarrette Blount and Nyheim Hines, WRs (46:08) including Curtis Samuel and Zay Jones, TEs (53:31) including potentially Samuels and Chris Herndon, DSTs (57:10) and IDP ... Your emails at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
This episode is sponsored by www.ZipRecruiter.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Fantasy Football, Rookies, Rankings, Waiver Wire
itunes:subtitle: Is this a good Waiver Wire week? It will ultimately depend on the health of some starting RBs. We've got options at each position and a lot of DST talk on today's show.
